head.title: Extract {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}}
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} is able to get one or more {{FileFormatUp}} document pages and save to standalone file.

header.title: Extract {{FileFormatUp}} pages
header.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can enrich {{EnvNameShort}} applications with powerful features in order to process {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is designed to process wide range of documents in popular formats. Supporting over 50 file formats, such as PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, etc., we provide capable features. Operations like merging, splitting, extracting, swapping, and removing pages available.

more_features.title: Document processing solution
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides many useful features to process more than 50 popular business file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge different document formats
feature_1.content: Combine documents such as PDFs, Word, PowerPoint, Excel, images, archives, and more. Use flexible options to specify additional details.

feature_2.title: Page manipulation
feature_2.content: Manipulate with particular page or range of pages. Move, remove, or swap pages to update your business documents.

feature_3.title: Control page appearance
feature_3.content: Rotate pages or change their orientation in landscape or portrait.

feature_4.title: Save selected pages
feature_4.content: Extract pages what you need and save them as a standalone document.

formats.title: Extract pages from many document formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, allowing you to manipulate files effectively.

examples.comment_2: Create extraction options with page number
examples.comment_4: Save them to the new location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) provides feature to extract pages from {{FileFormatUp}} documents. {{EnvName}} applications might be improved by adding abilities provided by our solution.
content.step_1: Specify the path to the source {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Select the page numbers to be extracted.
content.step_4: Save the pages to a new file.

code_1.title: Extract specific pages from documents
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to extract {{FileFormatUp}} pages range and save them as a new document.
code_1.comment_2: Create options which extract only even pages from a range
code_1.comment_4: Save extracted pages to result file
